about_the_game:
ARE YOU READY TO DISCOVER WHAT TERRORS LURK IN THE DEEP VOID OF SPACE?

A Shadow in Space is a narrative-driven sci-fi psychological horror game largely inspired by the works of renowned storytellers H.P. Lovecraft and Edgar Allan Poe.

Gameplay – Explore the GT-099 space station from a third-person perspective and uncover its many secrets from the viewpoint of two distinct protagonists. Interact with the environment, discover clues, and piece together the haunting narrative while meeting characters whose motives and allegiances may not always be clear.

Story – A Shadow in Space hopes to blend the supernatural terrors of Lovecraftian fiction with an intriguing, futuristic setting. But remember, not everything is as it seems...

Combat and Stealth – Outer space is filled with unknown dangers, and the game's two protagonists have different tools in their repertoire to deal with them: fight with weapons as necessary, or rely on silence and stealth to either avoid confrontation altogether, or take out unsuspecting enemies while staying hidden.

  • EXPLORE a desolate space station soaked in ancient, cosmic secrets

  • INVESTIGATE the fates of those who came before you, using their knowledge to your advantage

  • DISCOVER what unspeakable truths lurk beyond the veil of our reality

  • FIGHT inconceivable horrors that threaten to unravel your sanity
